hardscape.title: Hardscape
items: Boundary walls, bakod at retaining walls

items: Pag-install ng damo (natural at artificial), flower beds at vertical gardens

Reflecting pools at koi ponds, filtration systems

builder.title: Bigyang-buhay ang iyong ideya gamit ang aming interactive builder
builder.description: I-upload ang iyong espasyo o pumili ng template at makakuha ng instant AI-powered previews.
